attributes.review: When I open the app it started to glitch not to long after I got hacked on my iCloud. All of my information was not safe anymore. I don’t recommend this app at all
attributes.title: Absolute disgusting

attributes.review: took so long to download!! I thought this was a serious political app to help me understand who I’d be voting for but all I saw was pictures of a fat Oompa Loompa from Willy wonka’s factory idk how he got out but this app is such a joke do no take it seriously and don’t download it !!!!! 🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it crashed! The orange man needs to fix he’s app or I can’t help him keep America great! It also took forever too download it and I get 145 mbps! So I don’t understand why it took so long! Man this app is trash so I give it a 1 star!! 💅🏽😊
attributes.title: BLM & MLM

attributes.review: this app took forever to install on my phone and when it finally did it glitched a lot and is super slow i don’t recommend getting it
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app smells soooo bad. Right when I opened this app the scent of rotten oranges came flooding out. I immediately deleted the app. My phone has been cursed with the smell and it won't go away. I've tried everything it won't stop smelling. WHAT DO I DO!!!
attributes.title: Smells🧚🤢

attributes.review: This app hacked my phone and everything I go on trump post show up. He is racist and sexist and A CHILD RAPIST and I don’t appreciate getting news about one of the worst human beings alive. He claims he’s Christian but goes against everything in the Bible. Make that make sense.
attributes.title: Worst app ever.

attributes.review: So I was in the burmuda triangle with my uncle. We started to get sucked into a whirlpool and then the loch-ness monster hit my unclue off my boat! I pulled out the trump 2020 app, but trump didn’t show up to save us, I am currently in the stomach of the Loch Ness right now.
attributes.title: Trump didn’t save me

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it nearly took up all my storage. I didn’t think anything of it, so I looked on the app to see if there were any good reasons for me to vote for this man. After this, I said, “No hun.” This app deserves one star.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!

attributes.review: I got this app looking to find more reasons to vote for him but I didn’t. I am truly saddened cause I guess I will have to vote for joe Biden. Even though the most reliable source “Fox News” says he has dementia.
attributes.title: Makes not want to vote for are president

attributes.review: This is an app that supports and promotes racism, discrimination, white supremacy, taking away rights of women and lgbt, pedophelia, desperation of families, gassing children, and the list could continue. That isn’t something that should ever be stood for for anyone that simply respects other human beings.
attributes.title: For the greater good :)
